short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Check-In Hoyoverse Game on Hoyolab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,es,e:
Automatic Check In Hoyoverse games on Hoyolab everyday.
Currently Available Game: Genshin Impact, Honkai: Star Rail, Honkai Impact 3, Tears of Themis.

Please open an issue at Github if any error occur.
No Information/cookies is collected for this extension.
long.en_GB,en_US,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Automatic Check In Honkai: Star Rail on Hoyolab everyday.
Required to Login once on Hoyolab.
